summary: The implementation successfully covers all 7 core requirements with comprehensive frontend functionality. The hamburger menu, dark/light mode toggle, video hero section, AI shade scanner, product grid with hover effects, cart drawer, and WhatsApp checkout are all implemented. However, the backend is completely empty (actor {};), meaning REQ-4's backend processing requirement is not implemented.

missing_requirements.requirement: Backend processes uploaded image using multimodal vision capabilities
missing_requirements.reason: The backend/main.mo file contains only 'actor {};' with no implementation. The AI Shade Scanner frontend component exists but uses simulated/hardcoded results instead of actual backend multimodal vision analysis.
